info.title: Frontbase-DBSync API
info.description: Unified API for Frontbase and DB-Sync functionality

post.description: Login with email and password
Register a new admin user (disabled in production)

get.description: Get current authenticated user

post.description: Logout and clear session

get.description: Get all pages - matches Express: { success, data: pages[] }

post.description: Create a new page - matches Express: { success, data: page }

get.description:
Get a public page by slug for SSR.
No authentication required - used by Hono Edge Engine.
Returns page data if page exists and is public (or all for now during dev).

post.description:
Publish a page to Hono Edge Engine.
Gathers page data and sends to Hono /api/import endpoint.

get.description: Get a page by ID - matches Express: { success, data: page }

put.description: Update a page - matches Express: { success, data: page }

delete.description: Soft delete a page - matches Express: { success, message }

put.description: Update page layout - matches Express: { success, data: page }

post.description: Restore a deleted page - matches Express: { success, data: page, message }

delete.description: Permanently delete a page - matches Express: { success, message }

post.description:
Publish a workflow draft to the Actions Runtime (Hono).

This deploys the workflow so it can be executed via the runtime API.

Test-execute a workflow draft.

This publishes the draft temporarily (if not already published)
and triggers an execution.

get.description: Get execution history for a draft from the Actions Engine
